title: Star Guardian Syndra Recall update (?)
body:
How come riot removed the pinkish transformation of SG Syndra during her recall ????? 
Did you guys do it on purpose or what?? Why the only Syndra's one got removed???

replies.body:
Hey JayZence - 

This wasn't intentional, and is absolutely a bug. We're looking into this today to find out what may have caused this. Thanks for the report! :)
Oh! Thanks for your reply! Hope you guys will work it out soon:)
Should be good to go in the next patch!
As in the very next patch, not today? =(
Not today, it isn't something we'd hotfix -  it isn't gameplay impacting.
